TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeDescriptorFilterService

summary.span: 提供在设计模式下修改组件的成员描述符集的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface to modify the set of member descriptors for a component in design mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了一个允许在设计时修改的属性、 事件和类级别属性的组件的接口。The interface provides an interface that allows modification of the properties, events, and class-level attributes of a component at design time. 集内的一个组件，通过提供的描述符发生这种修改。This modification occurs through the set of descriptors that a component provides through a . 类型描述符将查询组件的站点服务，并且如果它存在，则类型描述符将传递到此服务已收集的所有元数据。The type descriptor will query a component's site for the service and, if it exists, the type descriptor will pass all metadata it has collected to this service. 该服务可以随后添加、 删除和更改的组件的现有特性修改元数据。The service can then modify the metadata by adding, removing, and altering existing characteristics of the component. 例如，可以通过调用修改组件的属性方法。For example, the properties of a component can be modified through a call to the method. 筛选器服务获取一个字典，其中包含属性名称和类型及其属性描述符。The filter service obtains a dictionary that contains property names and their property descriptors of type . 使用以下逻辑实现所做的修改。The modifications are implemented using the following logic. |修改Modification|实现Implementation| |------------------|--------------------| |删除Removal|删除在字典中对应的条目。Delete the corresponding entry in the dictionary.| |添加Addition|将适当的条目添加到字典。Add the appropriate entry to the dictionary.| |更改类型Alteration|调用现有的属性描述符方法，将为关联的属性描述符条目，或替换整个属性键/值对字典中。Call existing property descriptor methods, replace the associated property descriptor entry, or replace the entire property key/value pair in the dictionary.| 返回值确定是否修复这一组属性。The return value of determines if this set of properties is fixed. 如果此方法返回`true`，则有关此组件可以缓存的结果。If this method returns `true`, the for this component can cache the results. 此缓存将保留到上述任一组件进行垃圾回收或调用类型描述符的方法。This cache is maintained until either the component is garbage collected or the method of the type descriptor is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设计器若要筛选的任何新的或现有的属性集合以添加之前加载或重新加载设计器的按钮为新设计器设计器属性。The following code example demonstrates a designer that uses the to filter the attributes collection of any new or existing to add a designer attribute for a new designer before loading or reloading the designer for the button. 若要使用的示例，将代码添加到 Windows 窗体项目并从类库的组件加载到工具箱。To use the example, add the code to a Windows Forms project and load the components from the class library into the Toolbox. 另请参阅[演练： 自动填充工具箱与自定义组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx). 向窗体添加一些按钮。Add some buttons to your form. 添加`ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`向窗体，它将显示在组件栏中。Add a `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` to your form, and it will appear in the component tray. `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`将添加`ButtonDesignerFilterService`，它可以实现，作为设计模式服务提供商。The `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` will add a `ButtonDesignerFilterService`, which implements , as a design mode service provider. 现有的或新窗体上的对象将开始颜色循环之后`ButtonDesignerFilterService`与每个现有和新按钮的设计器替换`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`。Existing or new objects on the form will begin color cycling after the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` replaces the designer for each existing and new button with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`. 这些按钮将进行颜色的循环时您将鼠标指针移动它们，和交替继续循环或将前景色和背景颜色重置上`MouseLeave`事件。The buttons will color cycle when you move the mouse pointer over them, and alternately continue cycling or reset the background and foreground colors on `MouseLeave` events. 新将给定对象`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`通过方法`ButtonDesignerFilterService`的已加载，直到`ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`被释放，并替换原始。New objects will be given the `ColorCycleButtonDesigner` through the method of the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` that has been loaded, until the `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` is disposed and replaces the original . `ColorCycleButton`在此示例中的类是与关联`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`。The `ColorCycleButton` class in this example is a associated with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`. [!code-cpp[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 若要筛选器公开的成员描述符、 在组件上实现此接口并重写， ，或分别筛选属性、 事件或属性，此类的方法。
To filter the member descriptors exposed by a , implement this interface on a component and override the , , or methods of this class to filter attributes, events, or properties, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterAttributes (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Collections.IDictionary attributes);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterAttributes(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed
Public Function FilterAttributes (component As IComponent, attributes As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterAttributes : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

span.span: The component to filter the attributes of.
A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.

summary.span: 筛选组件通过 公开的属性。

span.span: Filters the attributes that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果将缓存经过筛选的特性集，则为 ；如果筛选服务必须再次查询，则为 。

span.span: if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求的一组组件的属性，调用此方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of attributes for a component. 要添加到字典中，该属性的特性作为键且实际的特性的值。The attributes are added to the dictionary with the attribute's as the keys and the actual attribute as the value. 此服务的实施者可以添加、 删除或更改在字典中的现有属性条目。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter existing attribute entries in the dictionary.

span.para: 返回仅在必需的因为重复对类型描述符的筛选器服务的查询可能会降低性能。
Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterEvents (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Collections.IDictionary events);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterEvents(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Public Function FilterEvents (component As IComponent, events As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterEvents : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

param.name: component
param.span: 要为其筛选事件的组件。

span.span: The component to filter events for.
A dictionary of events that can be modified.

summary.span: 筛选组件通过 公开的事件。

span.span: Filters the events that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果将缓存经过筛选的事件集，则为 ；如果筛选服务必须再次查询，则为 。

span.span: if the set of filtered events is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求的一组组件的事件，调用此方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of events for a component. 事件添加到字典中，事件名称作为键且相应对象作为值。The events are added to the dictionary with the event names as the keys and the corresponding objects as the values. 此服务的实施者可以添加、 删除或更改事件字典中的条目。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter event entries in the dictionary.

span.para: 返回仅在必需的因为重复对类型描述符的筛选器服务的查询可能会降低性能。
Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求组件的属性集，调用此方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of properties for a component. 属性添加到字典中，属性名称作为键且相应对象作为值。The properties are added to the dictionary with the property names as the keys and the corresponding objects as the values. 此服务的实施者可以添加、 删除或更改属性字典中的条目。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter property entries in the dictionary.

span.para: 返回仅在必需的因为重复对类型描述符的筛选器服务的查询可能会降低性能。
Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.
